author: Jason G
title: Well located, good amenities, friendly staff
text: Located close to the shops was a plus, the staff are friendly and genuinely try to assist where they can...note there is a language barrier as English is not common. Make sure you get a location card from the Hotel in Chinese if you intend to take a cab. We had a fantastic executive suite (upgraded as an Honours member) and can't complain though the AC wasn't great and it got pretty stuffy. Complements to the staff at the executive lounge as they were all great. If I was in Beijing again, I'd stay here.
